alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Leon County through 430 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Tallahassee to Tallahassee Comm College. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. At 330 PM EDT the Montford Middle School Weatherstem site measured a wind gust of 33 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Forest Meadows Park, Pisgah Church and Springsax Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
